good night to me,
and I was like... [sighs]

p.span: And then I wake up this morning
and he is not being himself at all.

div.p:
Maybe he had a really bad
dream about me and was like,
"Ugh, I hate her."

[Matthew]
#JaMoira have been doing lots of spooning,

p.span: but she's concerned the spoon may
too quickly turn into a fork.

div.p:
What do you think about
the pace we're going at?
[James] Um...

-I just hope you're ready to really get...
-Well...

...involved in something that
could really be fun.

-Sexually?
-Like I said, yeah...
It's just hard to do anything

when there are so many
other people in beds around us.

I definitely told the girls
that you have a big personality.

They were, like,
"We saw you making out last night."

-Big personality.
-I was like, "Oh, yeah."

-They were like, "How far did you go?"
-Big personality.

I was like, "Second base,"
and walked out the room. [laughs]
I like Moira, she's... she's great.

p.span: It's not just all about me.
And we're still learning about each other.

div.p: I hope she knows that I'm accepting it,
and I'm enjoying it,
and hopefully she thinks the same way.

I feel like I kind of want
to take it slower with that.
Yeah, so no more seeing my personality,
even though you want to?

-Yeah.
-Do you want to?

I do know what I want,
but I don't want to get played.

You know?
I don't want my heart to get broken.

-We'll figure it out.
-Okay.
Well, thanks for figuring it out with me.
I know. Mmm...

-Mmm. Mm-hmm.
-Right? Yeah...

Mmm... now I sound like
I'm doing little mannerisms like you.

-Mmm. You feel it now?
-Yeah, the "Mmm," I feel it.

[Matthew]
Doesn't want to see his big personality?

p.span: Why not? Oh, I get it!

div.p: [phone chimes]

-Uh-oh!
-Nah-uh!

-I got a text!
-[all cheer]
[indistinct chatter]
[Moira] Who got a text?

"Islanders,
tonight there will be a recoupling.

The boys will choice
and the girl not picked
risks being dumped from the island.
#GetPickedOrGetPacking,
#OverBeforeItBegan,
#WhatYouWaitingFor."
[islanders laugh and groan]

[Kaitlynn] I obviously feel,
like, a little bit nervous
for the recoupling tonight

because there is the possibility
of either me or Justine going home.
I think both of us want to be here,
and both of us deserve to be here.

But I still need to have
a conversation with Tre,
see where his head's at.
But yeah, it's a little nerve-racking.
I wonder who Tre is choosing, honestly.
It's up to him who leaves.

[Justine] There's a 50% chance
that I'm going home.
Because that's just been my luck in here.
As soon as I start to like somebody,

they're like,
"Sorry, I don't like you back."

p.span: to like somebody else, they're like,
I've had such a hard four days in here.

div.p:
And like,
trying to build connections, and...

I'd be just so bummed if as soon
as it started to happen for me,

it's like, "Pack your bags, girl,
you're going home."
That would just be the worst.

[Matthew]
The recoupling is happening very soonish,

Love Island's social scientists
Johnny and Carrington

p.span: are statistically likely to be dumped.

div.p:
[Johnny] Tre definitely has
a tough decision to make,
just because he's friends with Kaitlynn,
and he's friends with Justine.
I think the best way to look at it is,
who is here for the right reasons,
more so than who would have my back.

Because who would have my back,
you're kind of looking out for yourself.

[Carrington] They're both definitely here
for the right reasons.

-You never know, but...
-It's tough, bro.

p.span: If I had to put my money on it,
I would probably have to say Justine.

div.p:
-I want to see her stay.
-[Carrington] Yeah.
But if she stays,

I don't want to see her face
rejection again
and feel the way she's been feeling.

[Matthew] James and Connor,
who don't shave their faces,

p.span: talk about how perfect their lives are.
Let's see if the fake plants
come to life and throw up.

div.p:
-My dude!
-[Connor] My guy.
Has the day been going well for you?

-You feeling...
-Oh, bro, Moira and I are amazing.

-We're cool.
-Yeah.
Literally every hour I spend with her,
I like her more and more.

I'm putting myself out there,
and she knows how open I am.

And I'm so appreciative that
she's being open
because she is reserved, she is shy.

She is-- she even told me today,
it's hard for her to trust someone,
and she wants to so bad.
And when she is willing to do it with me,

-I am so happy that she is doing that.
-Yeah.
So, obviously, yeah, she's my number one.
I don't think-- I'm liking her!
That's awesome, man.

So, for me,
Mackenzie is so extremely selfless,

and she truly makes you feel comfortable
being yourself and around her.

-Yeah, it's like I've always seen that...
-Yeah.
But I felt that in my heart today.

-So, I'm... I can speak to that.
-That's what's up. All right!

I feel like I'm definitely going all in
with Mackenzie.
I couldn't be happier,

and I'm super happy just to go to sleep
with her by my side.

And I look forward just as much
to wake up in the morning

right next to her
each and every single day.
As far as cute things go...
Obviously, we know where you're at.

In general, me and you have been
steady with our girls.

It's nice to see, I'm so happy
we're like in the same boat.

Because I want to progress
this with you, bro.

-For sure.
-Like, you're my guy.

Literally, it's so crazy how
it's so cool to think about
the dynamic that we've got in each other.

[Matthew] On the verge of possibly
being kicked off the show,

p.span: sympathetic ears of James and Moira,

div.p:
Tre's going to make
a good decision tonight,
and I know he better think it through.

-I don't know.
-Giving us positive vibes now, James.

Being the not chosen one seems to be
the theme of my life, actually.
So I wouldn't be surprised if I wasn't.

I feel as though people
might be more team Justine,
which I love her, they should be,
but not more, I also want team Kaitlynn.
We should all wear pink tonight.

-Yeah, wear pink tonight.
-Try to get Tre to wear pink tonight.

[Kaitlynn] I'm glad that I have my girl
Moira and my man James,

because I definitely know that
they'll put in a good word for me.

p.span: and we don't know who those people are.

div.p: That's why I need to stay.
Hopefully nothing bad happens, you know?
A.K.A., me leaving.

-You're not leaving.
-That would be the bad thing, though,

-is what I'm saying.
-It would be.

What are we gonna do
without Kaitlynn here?

[Matthew] And we're back
at the Love Island Vegas rooftop island.

p.span: Let's see if Moira's relationship advice
is also against the whole grain.

div.p:
[Moira] It seems like
it could be a pretty big day for you.
Why do you say for me?

Because of the situation at hand,
you know?
Two extra girls.
What do you think?

You know, I don't want to
push you in any direction, obviously,

but are you that close
with Justine right now?
Like, I mean, I've talked to Justine,
and we're connecting and vibing

and I'm starting to open up a little bit,
like, get to know her more.
And things are going cool,
but I'm very attracted to Kaitlynn.

Obviously, like, we...
kissed a couple of times.

But I honestly don't know
where Kaitlynn's head is.

You know,
I can't speak for her obviously...
For sure.
But she's my girl.

And she should stay.
I think both of you deserve to find love.
[laughter]
I'm trying to keep my girl Kaitlynn here.
She is my rock in this villa.
We just click on the next level, you know?
[sighs] All right, well, thanks.

-Good luck.
-Thanks.
I definitely didn't make that any easier.

[Matthew] So after Moira pled the case
of potential dumpee Kaitlynn,

p.span: lobbied Tre on behalf of their client,

div.p:
[Mackenzie] Didn't you kiss Kaitlynn
privately over there?

-Yeah.
-Yeah.

I think Kaitlynn enjoyed your chat
and enjoyed the talk.
She enjoyed the kiss, but honestly, like,

everyone is seeing you with Justine
and the way you've been with her.

You haven't tried to be
as forward with her,

like, physically, which I think we're
all seeing a different side

of you from that,
and that's, like, refreshing.

I do know that Kaitlynn and Justine are
still very open to getting to know you.
So...

In here, you're definitely looking
for that person
that just makes you feel comfortable.

And I think that Tre and Justine
are that for one another.

It is good to talk to a girl
and get a girl's perspective,

because just sitting here
and thinking about it, you're right.

I just would say in the future,
especially if you do get recoupled,

and you're pursuing other things,
maybe just think about that.
Dang.
Does that help? [laughs]

It makes things more complicated,
but it helps.
It helps.

-Follow your heart.
-Thank you.

-You're welcome. Of course.
-I appreciate you, Mackenzie.

I'll let you two lovebirds
get back to your... your time.
You give super good advice.
[Mackenzie] Aw, so do you.

-[Justine] You okay? What's wrong?
-[Tre] Yeah.
[Tre] Nothing.

-[Justine] You look sad.
-[Tre] No, I'm not sad.

-[Tre] I'm cool.
-[Justine] Yeah?

-Yeah.
-Okay.
[soft music]
[sighs] Oh, my gosh.
[sighs]

[Tre]
It's just... it's a tough situation, man.

To be honest,
I would be happy to be paired up
with either one, Justine or Kaitlynn.
This is... this is tough.
You know, it's really tough.
[soft music continues]

Tre is torn, and, yes,
I am trying to keep my girl Kaitlynn here.

[Cely] I'm just a team Justine,
that's my girl.

I literally would be
devastated to see her go.
[Matthew] Next time...

I'm Caleb, I'm 24 years old,
I am the full package.
[Matthew] ...enter the villa.

You better be hungry,
because I'm a full six-course meal.
